text: Have been in at least a half-dozen times for breakfast, lunch, and their pork products. They have a wide variety of sandwiches each day. All make with fresh baguettes and pork products from the owners family farm.   It's a great spot for lunch, but make sure to take home some of their frozen sausages or other products. They are SO delicious.   Probably the best sandwich shop in Montreal that we've been to so far!
Excellents sandwichs (ah, celui au rôti de grand-mère...!), un choix de saucisses énorme, des desserts en nombre limité mais exquis (le muffin poire-chocolat !) et vendeuses très sympas.
